        Sprite.__init__(self, game)

     ➋ self.images_right = [
            PhotoImage(file='figure-R1.gif'),
            PhotoImage(file='figure-R2.gif'),
            PhotoImage(file='figure-R3.gif')
        ]

                image=self.images_left[0], anchor='nw')
